caption.p: NS5 mutations result in retardation of virus gRNA and augments the sfRNA:gRNA ratio. ( A– D) Quantification of gRNA levels ( A), sfRNA levels ( B), sfRNA:gRNA ratios ( C), and mRNA expression of IFN-β ( D) in primary monocytes by RT-qPCR. ( E) Quantification of gRNA levels in infected A545 cells using qPCR. ( F) Plaque-forming units determined from supernatant of infected cells. ( G) Quantification of sfRNA levels in infected A545 cells using qPCR. ( H) sfRNA:gRNA ratios quantified from gRNA and sfRNA levels. Data are presented as mean ± SD. * P < 0.05; ** P < 0.01; *** P < 0.001; *** P < 0.0001, unpaired t test. ns, not significant.
